title: Keramas Beach Surf Break (Half-day)
overview: Experience the world-class surf break and black sand at Keramas Beach, ideal for surfers and beach lovers.

stops.description: Arrive and surf or relax on the black sand beach.
Enjoy refreshments at a local beach bar.

title: Keramas Beach Surf & Chill (Full-day)
overview: A full day of surfing, sunbathing, and relaxing at Keramas Beach, known for its waves and vibrant atmosphere.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy surfing or relaxing on the beach.
Lunch and drinks at a local beach bar.
Continue surfing or enjoy the beach atmosphere.
